resources.string: Welcome! Click on the game you would like to play.

There is a farmer, wolf, goat, and a cabbage that needs to go to the other side of the river. The farmer can only take one other object besides himself across at the same time. The wolf can not be left with the goat and the goat can not be left with the cabbage. Find a sequence that allows them to get to the other side.

You are given a board in which numbered tiles can slide around. There is one blank space that holds no tile. A legal move consists of sliding a tile into the blank space if the tile is adjacent to it. The goal is to move tiles around until the board looks like the final state below.
"Welcome to the Farmer, Wolf, Goat, and Cabbage probem.
Click the tile you would like to move.
